rdf:resource="http://www.pershingsquareicerink.com"/>     <ds:event_description>Situated amid the Downtown Los Angeles skyscrapers, the rink will be open for ice skating daily, including holidays. There will also be a variety of free activities, including live concerts, youth programs, and special events.    Event times: Mondays through Thursdays, 11:30 a.m. \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 9:30 p.m., Fridays through Sundays, 10:00 a.m. - 11:00 p.m.  </ds:event_description>     <ds:start_date_and_time>2014-01-01T00:00:00</ds:start_date_and_time>     <ds:end_date_and_time>2014-01-20T00:00:00</ds:end_date_and_time>     <ds:event_location><geo:SpatialThing/></ds:event_location>     <ds:event_organizer>City of Los Angeles Department of Recreation and Parks</ds:event_organizer>     <ds:event_contact>213-624-4289</ds:event_contact>     <ds:event_cost>$8 per hour</ds:event_cost>     <ds:event_type>Family Friendly, Great Outdoors</ds:event_type></rdf:Description> <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9/3">     <socrata:rowID>3</socrata:rowID>     <rdfs:member rdf:resource="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9"/>     <ds:event_name>1st Thursday San Pedro Art Walk</ds:event_name>     <foaf:document rdf:resource="http://www.1stthursday.com"/>     <ds:event_description>On the first Thursday of each month, the artists, entertainers, and business people of San Pedro celebrate the arts with an evening of open galleries, studios, street vendors, and live entertainment in the Downtown San Pedro Arts District.  Downtown San Pedro is magically transformed into a village of creativity surrounded by historical architecture, including the magnificent Warner Grand Theatre, quaint restaurants and cafes, plus plenty of places to shop for unusual items and gifts. Bring the whole family for an enjoyable evening in this seaside village.    </ds:event_description>     <ds:start_date_and_time>2014-01-02T17:00:00</ds:start_date_and_time>     <ds:end_date_and_time>2014-01-02T21:00:00</ds:end_date_and_time>     <ds:event_location><geo:SpatialThing/></ds:event_location>     <ds:event_organizer>San Pedro Peninsula Chamber of Commerce</ds:event_organizer>     <ds:event_cost>free</ds:event_cost>     <ds:event_type>Family Friendly, Culture & Community, Arts & Antiques</ds:event_type></rdf:Description> <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9/4">     <socrata:rowID>4</socrata:rowID>     <rdfs:member rdf:resource="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9"/>     <ds:event_name>Undiscovered Chinatown Tour </ds:event_name>     <foaf:document rdf:resource="http://www.chinatownla.com"/>     <ds:event_description>Tours take visitors to a number of off-the-beaten-track points of cultural and historical interest, and will guide those interested in shopping to some of Chinatown\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds best bargains and trendiest shops. Designated the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdWorld's Greatest Naval Ship\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd due to her big guns, heavy armor, fast speed, longevity and modernization, she kept pace with technology for more than 50 years. USS Iowa is now transforming into the most interactive and educational museum of its kind. The festival will show our appreciation for all that this nation\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds veterans have done to protect our freedoms. The free events is for the whole family and will include live music, a resource fair, free food, and loads of activities!  Time to be announced, please check website for details  </ds:event_description>     <ds:start_date_and_time>2014-11-08T00:00:00</ds:start_date_and_time>     <ds:end_date_and_time>2014-11-08T00:00:00</ds:end_date_and_time>     <ds:event_location><geo:SpatialThing/></ds:event_location>     <ds:event_organizer>Port of Los Angeles, Battleship USSIowa</ds:event_organizer>     <ds:event_contact>310-732-3508</ds:event_contact>     <ds:event_cost>Free</ds:event_cost>     <ds:event_type>Family Friendly, Free!, Fairs & Festivals</ds:event_type></rdf:Description> <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9/384">     <socrata:rowID>384</socrata:rowID>     <rdfs:member rdf:resource="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9"/>     <ds:event_name>Autumn Festival</ds:event_name>     <foaf:document rdf:resource="http://www.aquariumofpacific.org"/>     <ds:event_description>Experience the cultures of\ufffd\ufffdAsia\ufffd\ufffdduring the\ufffd\ufffdAquarium\ufffd\ufffdof the Pacific\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds thirteenth annual Autumn Festival. rdf:resource="http://www.1stthursday.com"/>     <ds:event_description>On the first Thursday of each month, the artists, entertainers, and business people of San Pedro celebrate the arts with an evening of open galleries, studios, street vendors, and live entertainment in the Downtown San Pedro Arts District.  Downtown San Pedro is magically transformed into a village of creativity surrounded by historical architecture, including the magnificent Warner Grand Theatre, quaint restaurants and cafes, plus plenty of places to shop for unusual items and gifts. Bring the whole family for an enjoyable evening in this seaside village.      </ds:event_description>     <ds:start_date_and_time>2014-12-04T17:00:00</ds:start_date_and_time>     <ds:end_date_and_time>2014-12-04T21:00:00</ds:end_date_and_time>     <ds:event_location><geo:SpatialThing/></ds:event_location>     <ds:event_organizer>San Pedro Peninsula Chamber of Commerce</ds:event_organizer>     <ds:event_cost>free</ds:event_cost>     <ds:event_type>Family Friendly, Culture & Community, Arts & Antiques, Free!</ds:event_type></rdf:Description> <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9/392">     <socrata:rowID>392</socrata:rowID>     <rdfs:member rdf:resource="http://data.lacity.org/resource/acy8-72w9"/>     <ds:event_name>Annual Holiday Boutique</ds:event_name>     <foaf:document rdf:resource="http://www.mcgroartyartscenter.org"/>     <ds:event_description>Find affordable, quality gifts for everyone one your list. The McGroarty Arts Center presents the finest local artists and artisans, carefully selected to sell their hand-crafted work. Original paintings, photographs, soaps, lotions, and jewelry are just some of the treasures you'll find. Live musicians provide ambient music on harp, piano, flute, guitar, and violin throughout the day.\ufffd\ufffdThe chili bowl sale offers a great deal on hand-made ceramic bowls, created on-site by the McGroarty Ceramics Department.
